about_the_game:
*This game is still in early development. The current visuals and features may not be final.*

- Find your way in Shalmeowdar, the Dream Realm! Explore procedural generated dungeons and fight bullet hell Boss battles to stop the resurrection of the Dark Lord! The devil lives inside you...

- Roguelike Dungeon Crawler: if you die, you'll lose your progress and power ups gained during the exploration! (or choose easy mode and restart where you lost)

- Avoid enemy attacks or direct them to others with your pillow! You can't damage your enemies, but they can hurt each other!

- The wolf is among us... Investigate in town by talking to locals and solving mysteries. Find the enemy among your friends!

- Build your relationship with the locals to unlock new skills and secret stories! Cute characters to talk with and date! And sleep with! (not what you think)

- Grow your stats and abilities with equipment worthy of great warriors: bedding and fashion accessories! Have great meals to become the number one hero! Eat well, sleep well and you'll grow stronger!

- With the help of the Goddess of Dream Shina, unleash special abilities to stop your enemies! Godlike powers! (but only in your dreams)

- Game made by one person

name: Nodyssey
short_description: A Dungeon Crawler RPG where you stay in your bedroom to defeat the Evil! Explore procedural generated dungeons, gain new abilities, build relationships and solve mysteries to overcome the dream realm! Enjoy your quiet life in town during the day, but prepare to face terrible Nightmares at night...
